ack.title: Acknowledgments
ack.p: This research was funded by The Royal Golden Jubilee Ph.D. program, grant number PHD/0003/2558 and National Research Council of Thailand (NRCT). We would like to express our gratitude toAunchalee Tonsomboon (CBMM, Chulalongkorn University) and staffs at Heidelberg University (Germany) for their technical support Furthermore, the authors sincerely thank Szu Ting Ng and Chon Seng Tan from Ligno Biotechâ„¢Sdn Bhd for the LR sclerotial powder.
